level.heading: STEP-BACK FOR CERTAIN BUILDINGS AND STRUCTURES ON POTOMAC AVENUE (CG) (ยง1-1608)

level.text: The following provisions apply to new buildings, structures, or uses with frontage on Potomac Avenue within the CG Overlay.
Any portion of a building or structure that exceeds 110 feet in height shall provide an additional one-to-one (1:1) step-back from the building line along Potomac Avenue.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 1587-1592 (February 16, 2007); as corrected by Errata Notice published at 58 DCR 4314, 4315 (May 20, 2011).
